The main purpose of module is to cover data/tidying (inside R), how to reshape data, and how to combine datasets together using a common identifier

Main topics to cover:

'tidying' data through string manipulations

- read_csv and column defs + tibbles
- unite/separate
- str_sub
- str_split
- trimws
- paste/paste0
- replace_na
- parse_numeric/as.numeric
- drop_na
- (possibly) {janitor} for clean column names
- (possibly) {broom} for turning base R stat output into nice rectangles

pivoting data long/wide -> useful for ggplot

- pivot_wider
- pivot_longer


combining datasets through joins/binds

- rbind
- cbind
- merge
- full/inner/left/right joins
- bind_rows
- bind_cols
